# setMessage(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the text message included in the friend invitation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setMessage(_ message: String?)
```

## Parameters

- **message**: The text message.

## Discussion

If you do not set a text message, GameKit sets a default text message.
title: setMessage(_:)
